features: 12-fluid ounce bottle of Aveeno Sheer Hydration Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion to nourish, replenish and intensely hydrate dry skin for 24 hours of moisture while leaving a lightweight, breathable feel on skin

The unique formula contains nourishing oat, a skincare ingredient known for its nourishing properties. This sheer body lotion is non-greasy, non-comedogenic, paraben free, dye free, and allergy tested
Once applied after a bath or shower, the sheer daily body lotion absorbs in seconds, resulting in a fresh feeling you will want to experience year-round
Your trusted Aveeno Sheer Hydration Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion bottle is made with 30% Post-Consumer Recycled Plastic
From the dermatologist-recommended brand for over 70 years, Aveeno uses the goodness of nature and the power of science to keep skin feeling and looking healthy, balanced, and beautiful
body.description: Product Description Intensely moisturize your skin with Aveeno Sheer Hydration Fragrance-Free Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion. This ultra-sheer lotion for dry skin absorbs in seconds, for a fresh, lightweight feel you'll want to use year-round. Made with nourishing oat, its unique formula is fragrance-free and provides 24 hours of moisture for beautiful, healthier-looking skin. This hydrating daily body moisturizer is non-greasy, non-comedogenic, paraben free, dye free, & allergy tested. From the dermatologist-recommended brand for over 70 years, Aveeno uses the goodness of nature and the power of science to keep your skin looking and feeling healthy and balanced. Apply this lotion after your shower or bath to leave your skin hydrated all day. Aveeno Sheer Hydration lotion bottle is made with 30% Post-Consumer Recycled Plastic. Brand Story By Aveeno

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizes older skin
reviews.reviewText: My skin has always been oily, but as I age it becomes more wrinkled on my forearms especially. I use this every other day. I get overheated easily. It has helped the texture of the skin without causing irritation. The dimethicome ingredient seals the skin. Yay! It absorbs quickly. No wetness or greasiness. Love it. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absorbs soooooo fast, no residue on skin
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I wanted. I have sensory issues with lotion. I hate the way they feel on my skin, I hate the way it feels when I put clothes over lotioned skin. I hate my skin feeling sticky or greasy hours after it’s applied. I hate feeling like I have a layer sitting on top of my skin even hours later.I also have sensitive skin, I can’t do scented items or I get itchy/rashy and a lot of scents cause me to have a headache. And I didn’t want something that caused me to break out. I’ve had a really hard time finding a lotion to meet all my needs but this is it!My skin slurps this up in seconds! Truly! It absorbs so fast, by the time I’m done spreading it over my body it’s practically dry. Feeling my skin after application it is soft, but dry, no residue, no greasy layer, you can’t even tell I put something on other than the fact the the skin is soft and no dry skin flakes. Perfect! I can put clothes on right away and not “feel” the lotion because it has completely absorbed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this lotion for years then I switched to another brand, unfortunately the price went up and they changed the formula on this other brand, so I have started using Aveeno again and I couldn't be happier. I have very sensitive skin and this lotion doesn't make me itch, it absorbs into my skin right away with no sticky or oily feelings. It leaves my skin feeling very soft. I truly love the way Aveeno gets the job done. It has a faint scent, but it's not too much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this Aveeno right after a shower on those areas that are excessively dry to stop the dry itch before it starts. It works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light -- very light -- dries super fast , not sticky.
reviews.reviewText: OK __ The details :This lotion is a light and airy and non-sticky body lotion that can be used even as a facial moisturizer .Yes __ it is that light .There is _ NO __ real scent to this , so it will not clash with other products.My skin is super sensitive and this is one of the few that I have ever tried that does __ NOT __ cause my skin to become inflamed or itchy .This is a very good product .Dreamer 

reviews.reviewTitle: En oferta vale la pena, excelente crema sencilla y sobre todo SIN IRRITANTES comunes
reviews.reviewText: Ligera, sin fragancia, no tiene petrolato (no tan emoliente), pero parece que está muy bien.Cómo crema/loción corporal está excelente, no la he probado (aún) en mi rostro (ya lo haré y dejaré mi reseña), pero para manos y brazos, todo bien.No tengo quejas, los productos sin fragancia de aveeno tienen buenos ingredientes, y este pese a su sencillez no está nada mal. No tiene nada ultra especial como ácido hialurónico o ceramidas, pero si tiene harina de avena que asumo ayuda a esta versión "fresca". Es una crema muy sencilla y básica que para lo que me costó en oferta ($176 mxn, $8.7 usd dlls), me pareció genial porque los productos sin: fragancia, aceites naturales, extractos naturales y otros irritantes, siempre son más caros.La considero una buena crema complementaria a mi bloqueador solar, pero no necesariamente una buena crema para usar en la noche, no obstante eso aún no lo compruebo.
Product is very good. It gives immediate hydration to the skin which lasts longer
Always use this. Love the product
Ce produit est très bon ; rend la peau plus douce et n'est absolument pas gras.Dommage qu'il ne soit vendu qu'à l'étranger et qu'il faille payer des frais de port importants...

reviews.reviewTitle: The bottle is leaked all over the wrapper.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like this product however the item is leaked as per photo attached.So troublesome to use for daily due to pump is not working.Paid money for troublesome. What is your suggestion. Kindly replace it for loss if possible.
